name: Spelling bee!
description:
In "Spelling Bee," you take control of a swarm of bees as they navigate through a field of flowers to collect letters to spell out a hidden word. With each correct letter, the word begins to reveal itself, and players can strive to beat their high score and earn bonus points by collecting letters quickly and accurately.

With support for multiple languages and varying difficulty levels, "Spelling Bee" offers a fun and challenging experience for players of all ages and skill levels.

Can you spell your way to the top of the hive?

Features the following languages as of today:

  • English: 32 words
  • Norwegian:23 words
  • German: 3 words
  • French: 3 words
  • Spanish: 3 words
  • Japanese: 3 words (as pronounced with latin letters)
  • Thai: 3 words (as pronounced with latin letters)

This game is not done quite yet, and many more words are planned to increase your vocabulary.

This is my first game that i have published, so please come with feedback and i will try and fix what you find!
